translation.zh: 你怎么让他们这样对我？

translation.en: Unfortunately, these were the only fireworks left in our marriage at this point.
translation.zh: 不幸的是 那是我们婚姻中 唯一一次烟火

translation.en: Rodeo's over.
Fireworks are on.
Eva's decision to keep my leg
was so that I could continue to enjoy skiing and biking with the children.
translation.zh: 让我可以继续和孩子们 滑雪、骑自行车

translation.en: I always felt bad about how I spoke to her that day.
translation.zh: 那天对她说那种话 我一直感到抱歉

translation.en: Try to control your breathing.
Slow it down.
You can scream if you want.
Easy.
This pain...
I know.
Almost done.
Good morning, Doctor.
How long do I have to endure this device?
translation.zh: 我还得忍受这东西多久？

translation.en: How long before I...
I know if it works?
How long before I can walk again?
translation.zh: 还有多久我才能重新走路？

translation.en: A few months.
How few?
Many months. Maybe more.
translation.zh: 好多个月 可能还更多

translation.en: You mean possibly a few years?
A year maybe. I really don't know.
translation.zh: 或许是一年 具体我也不知道

translation.en: And there's no guarantee that I'm gonna be able to keep these limbs?
translation.zh: 你也不能保证我能保住四肢？

translation.en: No guarantee.
You could develop an infection and we'd have to amputate the leg.
translation.zh: 你可能会感染 那样我们就不得不截肢

translation.en: So I could endure this for months and still end up with no leg?
translation.zh: 所以我可能忍受几个月后 还是保不住腿？

translation.en: I'm hoping your left arm has a better chance.
translation.zh: 我希望你的左臂恢复机会更大

translation.en: We took bones from your right pelvis
translation.zh: 我们取了你右侧骨盆的骨头

translation.en: and put them into your left forearm.
translation.zh: 将它们接入你的左前臂

translation.en: It's kind of like taking core samples when you're drilling for oil, as an example.
translation.zh: 这就好比钻井取油前 要先取样

translation.en: We're going to have to move Mr. Piper to Saint Luke's tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明天我们必须将派珀先生 转院到圣路加

translation.en: Why do we have to move him?
I believe Don should be able to stay here.
translation.zh: 我想唐应该可以住在这

translation.en: I agree.
But this is out of my hands.
I've done everything I know to prevent this from happening,
translation.zh: 我已经尽力防止发生这种事

translation.en: but I can't stop it.
There's a situation at the hospital.
Our insurance no longer covers Don's treatment here.
translation.zh: 我们的保险已经无力支付 唐的治疗费用了

translation.en: Is there anything you can do?
-I need answers. -Yes, of course you do.
-I'm your Beau. You at the hospital? -Yes.
translation.zh: -保您称心如意 你在医院吗？ -是的

translation.en: Meet me in the cafeteria.
I tried but the administrator's right. They're not gonna budge.
translation.zh: 我尽力了 但负责人说得对 他们不会让步

translation.en: There's nothing you can do to change things?
It's about what the hospital can get from the insurance company.
translation.zh: 关键要看医院能从保险公司得到什么

translation.en: What about our case? Our settlement?
translation.zh: 我们的官司呢？怎么解决法？

translation.en: Well, I've got good news and I've got bad news,
translation.zh: 我有好消息 也有坏消息

translation.en: but the bad news takes out the good news, so all we're left with really is bad news.
translation.zh: 但坏消息占上风 所以其实只有坏消息

translation.en: What?
Well, in Texas, state employees are indemnified by the State of Texas.
translation.zh: 在德州 德州政府可以替州雇员赔偿

translation.en: Okay, how does this affect us?
translation.zh: 好 这对我们有什么影响？

translation.en: Well, the state, in this case, Texas,
translation.zh: 至于这个案子 德州

translation.en: has put a cap on all damages that are able to be collected
translation.zh: 对任何起诉该州的官司

translation.en: in any lawsuit against the state,
and the cap is $250,000.
Now, insurance companies, they have subrogation rights.
translation.zh: 现在保险公司有代位权

translation.en: Which means that they're gonna put a lien against any kind of claim and settlement
translation.zh: 也就是会所他们对 任何索赔和处理

translation.en: or any funds received from a lawsuit to cover their medical expenses.
translation.zh: 或诉讼案赔付的任何资金有留置权 以支付他们的医疗开支

translation.en: In other words,
your insurance company is gonna take all the money.
translation.zh: 你们的保险公司 会拿走全部的钱

translation.en: Don will receive nothing?
No.
You know, I had a friend one time, he asked me,
he said, "What kind of cookies you bake when you don't have any money?"
translation.zh: “没钱时你会做什么样的甜点？”

translation.en: I said, "I don't know, what?" He says, "Shortbread."
translation.zh: 我说：“不知道 怎么了？” 他说：“酥饼”

translation.en: Unfortunately, Don's gonna have to bake shortbread cookies on this one.
translation.zh: 不幸的是 唐此刻就必须做酥饼

translation.en: He'd have been better off if he'd been hit by a Budweiser truck.
translation.zh: 他被百威的卡车撞到 情况都要比现在好

translation.en: And then we'd all be talking about millions of dollars.
translation.zh: 那样的话 我们就可以谈上百万的赔偿金

translation.en: Partner, can I give you a card?
You show up here just to tell me this?
translation.zh: 你来这就是为了跟我说这些？

translation.en: How we gonna do this?
We'll take him by ambulance.
translation.zh: 我们会用救护车转移他

translation.en: You can drive your car.
Even though Saint Luke's was only five blocks away,
translation.zh: 虽然圣路加只在五个街区外

translation.en: it was such a painful move with the fixators on my leg and arm.
translation.zh: 转院途中腿上和手上的固定器 还是让我痛苦不堪

translation.en: Every bump resonated through my bones.
translation.zh: 每一次颠簸都让我痛到骨髓里

translation.en: Eva stayed strong,
trying not to cry out as she watched me go through this.
translation.zh: 看到我遭受这一切 她努力不哭出来 第25天

translation.en: It's not very pretty here.
It's not ideal. I'm sorry.
I'm so sorry, Don.
When they picked this color blue,
it must have been a cloudy day.
Mr. Piper, Mrs. Piper.
translation.zh: 派珀先生 派珀太太

translation.en: -How you guys doing today? -Hi there.
-Thank you. -Good, good.
I've got some relief for you, Mr. Piper.
translation.zh: 我给你带止痛药来了 派珀先生

translation.en: I'm gonna take good care of you, okay? Let me just have that arm.
translation.zh: 我来照顾你 好吗？ 把那只手臂给我

translation.en: I'm gonna just hook this up for you,
and this will make you feel a lot better.
All righty.
This is real simple, Mr. Piper.
translation.zh: 这很简单 派珀先生

translation.en: All you need to do is,
anytime you feel you need some relief,
translation.zh: 任何时候你需要止痛药时

translation.en: this will just take it all away for you.
All I need you to do is push this little button here
and it releases medication, all right?
translation.zh: 它就会释放出止痛药 好吗？

translation.en: And just call me if you need me.
All right, Mrs. Piper?
-Thank you. -All right, you're welcome.
Mr. and Mrs. Piper, how you doing today?
translation.zh: 派珀先生和太太 今天怎么样？

translation.en: -We're fine, thank you. -Good.
And how about him?
Hey, Mr. Piper.
So, have you eaten today?
Did you have therapy today?
Did Dr. Greider come by?
Have you had a bowel movement today?
Maybe that's why you're so grumpy.
translation.zh: 或许这就是你心情不好的原因

translation.en: All right, I'll be back later to check up on you.
translation.zh: 好 我过会儿再过来看你

translation.en: -Let me know if I can get you anything. -Thank you.
You're welcome.
Why don't you talk?
I can't figure out what's going on inside of you.
translation.zh: 我没法知道你心里想些什么

translation.en: What happened to you?
Talk to me!
Don, answer me!
I'm sitting right here, please. Why aren't you answering me?
translation.zh: 我就坐在这 求你 你为什么不回答我？

translation.en: Where do you go?
You're not even here anymore.
Is there something you want to tell me?
translation.zh: 你有什么话想对我说吗？

translation.en: Where's my husband?
He's not here.
I miss him.
Should I get that for you?
Should I answer that for you?
translation.zh: 我该去帮你接这个电话吗？

translation.en: Hello?
"How's Don?"
He doesn't talk.
He lies here and he doesn't seem to care.
translation.zh: 他躺在这 好像什么都不在乎

translation.en: Hi, Dad.
Let me call you back. Okay.
What's that?
I know I should have been grateful to be alive.
translation.zh: 我知道死而复生 我该感恩戴德

translation.en: My downcast attitude was taking its toll on everyone.
translation.zh: 我消沉的态度 影响到了每个人

translation.en: But I just felt like something was missing and I didn't deserve to be here.
translation.zh: 但我就是感觉像丢了什么东西 我不值得在这里

translation.en: Hi, Daddy.
Okay, kids, it's time to get on the road. We need to not tire out your father.
translation.zh: 好了 孩子们 该上路了 我们不能让你爸爸太累

translation.en: It's okay, Dad. I'm gonna take them on the first floor to the McDonald's.
translation.zh: 没事的 爸爸 我带他们去一楼的麦当劳

translation.en: Come on. Come on, baby.
Come on.
-Are you okay, Mom? -Yeah.
I never would have dreamed that a cheeseburger and fries would be so good.
translation.zh: 我从没想过干酪汉堡和炸薯条 会这么好吃

translation.en: I'm in love with French fries.
You're in love with French fries?
Me, too.
Do you think Dad will be home for my birthday?
translation.zh: 你觉得我生日时爸爸可以回家吗？

translation.en: I hope so.
I know he wants to.
Grandpa makes us do our homework before we go to the lake.
translation.zh: 外公让我们做完作业 才能去湖边玩

translation.en: As he should.
But he doesn't help us like you do.
translation.zh: 但他不像你一样教我们写作业

translation.en: Don.
I came to say good night.
You don't want to say good night?
I am tired of this.
You don't seem to care about anything.
You don't care that you're back here with us.
translation.zh: 你回到我们身边了 但你都不在乎

translation.en: You don't care when the children come and visit you.
translation.zh: 孩子们来看你 你也不在乎

translation.en: You don't want to grow old with me,
or see the children get married.
translation.zh: 不想看着孩子们独自成家

translation.en: You don't care.
You can take your pain away with that button,
translation.zh: 你按那个按钮就能解除痛苦

translation.en: but you are causing it to everyone else.
translation.zh: 但你却让身边的每个人痛苦

translation.en: Welcome to McDonald's. Can I take your order?
translation.zh: 欢迎光临麦当劳 您要点什么？

translation.en: Sorry, that's not on the menu.
translation.zh: 抱歉 菜单上没有这个

translation.en: Lord...
God,
does it really have to be like this?
The pain of the injuries,
I can handle that.
Even seeing the pity and the helplessness
translation.zh: 即便见到爱我、关心我的人眼中

translation.en: in the eyes of the people who love me and care for me,
I can get through that.
But if this is as good as it's ever gonna get...
I don't want to be a burden.
I was just trying to get back to Alvin and you took me to heaven.
translation.zh: 我只想回阿尔文教堂 你们带我上天堂

translation.en: Can't you take me back?
translation.zh: 你难道不能带我回去吗？

translation.en: Now.
I want to go back to heaven.
My home.
My home is heaven now.
Jesus, let me come back home, please!
translation.zh: 耶稣 让我回家吧 求求您！

translation.en: Please let me come back home.
South Park hired me to be your interim while you're incapacitated,
translation.zh: 你行动不便期间 南方公园公园雇我临时代替你

translation.en: so I guess you could say I'm out of retirement.
translation.zh: 我猜你要说我这是退休后复出

translation.en: Can I get you a magazine?
translation.zh: 我去给你买本杂志好吗？

translation.en: Would you like a milkshake?
How about a hamburger?
You lost quite a bit of weight, son.
Would you like for me to read to you from the Bible?
Or any other book, for that matter.
Really, no.
Thanks for coming.
You know, you really need to get your act together.
translation.zh: 你现在真应该振作起来

translation.en: Sir?
You need to get your act together. You're not doing a very good job right now.
translation.zh: 你必须振作起来 你现在表现可不怎么好

translation.en: I'm not sure I understand.
Besides that, you're a raging hypocrite.
translation.zh: 另外 你就是个暴躁的伪君子

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking...
You got all these people out there who care so much for you
translation.zh: 你身边的人都这么关心你

translation.en: and you have no idea how much they love you.
translation.zh: 你都不知道大家有多爱你

translation.en: -I know they love me. -Really?
Yeah.
You're doing a pretty poor job of letting them know you're aware of that fact.
translation.zh: 你没让他们知道你懂他们的爱 这可不怎么地

translation.en: I don't think you're treating them right.
translation.zh: 我觉得你没有善待他们

translation.en: Now, they can't heal you,
but they would heal you if they could.
translation.zh: 如果可以 他们一定治好你

translation.en: And if they could trade places with you, many of them would do that.
translation.zh: 如果能跟你互换 很多人都愿意这样做

translation.en: -Yeah... -And do anything for you
without any waver.
I don't want them to do anything.
Truth is, I don't even want them to be here. I'd just as soon they not come.
translation.zh: 事实上 我都不想他们来看我 我不想他们来

translation.en: I know it's inconvenient. They must have better things to do.
translation.zh: 我知道我给大家带来不便 他们一定有更好的事要做

translation.en: I know that!
Why would I want anyone to come see me like this?
translation.zh: 我怎么会希望有人看到我这个样子？

translation.en: It's awful!
It's not your call.
It's not about you.
You spent the better part of your life trying to minister to other people,
translation.zh: 你人生中较好的时光 都在做牧师为他人布道

translation.en: trying to be there for their needs,
and to be there for them through difficulty and tragedy.
translation.zh: 陪伴他们度过困难和悲剧

translation.en: I've tried to.
And yet you have deprived them of doing the same thing for you.
translation.zh: 但你现在却剥夺别人 这样反过来帮你的权利

translation.en: And that's all they have to offer you, Don.
You're taking that gift away from them. I appreciate them.
translation.zh: -而你却夺走他们这份权利 -我感谢他们

translation.en: I do. I know they want to help and I think that's very fine and all, but...
translation.zh: 真的 我知道他们想帮忙 我觉得很好 但是

translation.en: But nothing!
Now, I want you to let them in, you hear me?
translation.zh: 现在我想让你请他们进来 听到没？

translation.en: You're going to let them in
and let them help you.
I can't.
Well, if you don't feel like you can for yourself,
translation.zh: 你要是觉得为你自己不行

translation.en: what about doing it for me?
What about next time somebody walks through that door
and wants to do something for you, I don't care what it is,
translation.zh: 想为你做点事 我不管什么事

translation.en: say yes.
Let a few folks
express their love by doing something for you.
translation.zh: 为你做点什么 表达他们对你的爱

translation.en: I mean, promise me that you'll do that.
Just...
Look,
try it for me.
You're gonna need to get better at this.
translation.zh: 这方面你必须表现得更好些

translation.en: Now, this is one of the lessons that God wants you to learn.
translation.zh: 这是上帝想要你 吸取的教训之一

translation.en: All right, I promise.
People are God's hands to meet your needs
translation.zh: 大家是上帝之手 就是来帮助你的

translation.en: and answer your prayers.
We'll just keep looking till it feels right.
translation.zh: 我们继续找 找到合适的为止

translation.en: What kind of house are we looking for?
translation.zh: 我们要找什么样的房子？

translation.en: Well,
probably something one story, manageable to get around in for Dad.
translation.zh: 可能找个单层的 让爸爸好出入

translation.en: Is Dad gonna be in a wheelchair?
Yeah. For a little while.

translation.zh: 随着医疗费用越来越高 伊娃要找一间我们住得起的房子

translation.en: that would accommodate my needs once I was discharged from Saint Luke's.
translation.zh: 而且我从圣路加医院出院后 还要方便我进出

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, there he is.
Got something for you.
Look, let me do it. Looks like you need my help.
translation.zh: 我来吧 看来你需要我帮忙

translation.en: How are you today?
Not speaking to me again?
Okay. It's a letter.
It says, "Hi there, we share wrenches.
translation.zh: 上面说：“你好 我们一起经历着伤痛

translation.en: "Fortunately for both of us, our fixators are interchangeable,
translation.zh: 咱俩都很幸运 我们的固定器还可以互换

translation.en: "and we can borrow tools from one another."
That's so cute. Look at that. It's a happy face.
translation.zh: 好可爱 瞧瞧 还有个笑脸呢

translation.en: -Who is this? -This is from Christy.
Christy is a teenage girl that lives in the next room.
translation.zh: 克丽丝蒂是住在隔壁的少女

translation.en: She was born with one leg shorter than the other,
translation.zh: 她天生有条腿比另一条短

translation.en: so she had to have surgery to attach the Ilizarov frame, like yours,
translation.zh: 她接受了手术 像你一样 也装了骨外固定器

translation.en: so that both legs would be of normal size.
translation.zh: 这样她的两条腿才能长得一样长

translation.en: She has a fixator, too?
She goes on.
"And we share something else, too. Pain."
translation.zh: “我们还有一个共同点 就是疼痛”

translation.en: She says, "I hear you scream at night sometimes, as you probably hear me, too.
translation.zh: 她说：“有时候我听到你在夜里喊叫 你也可能听到我叫了

translation.en: "Although our nurse says that you don't admit to it."
translation.zh: 虽然我们的护士说你不承认”

translation.en: Don't... Don't... Don't shoot me now.
I'm just the messenger, Mr. Piper.
translation.zh: 我只是信使 派珀先生

translation.en: And she goes on and says,
"You're not alone. Sincerely, Christy."
translation.zh: “你并不孤单 此致 克丽丝蒂”

translation.en: That is so sweet.
Can you get me a pen and paper, please?
translation.zh: 你可以给我拿纸和笔吗？

translation.en: I can if you acknowledge me.
translation.zh: 你谢谢我的话 我就给你拿

translation.en: There you go.
I like that.
All right. I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 好吧 我一会儿给你拿来

translation.en: That's my boy.
"Dear Christy,
"in some of my worst moments of self-pity, I think of never being normal again.
translation.zh: 在我自叹自怜这些糟糕的日子里 我觉得我再也不能恢复正常了

translation.en: "I believe that when all of the pain is over, "Christy, you will be a normal young woman.
translation.zh: 我相信等所有的疼痛消退 克丽丝蒂 你就会恢复成正常的姑娘

translation.en: "You will play and run and do everything a normal teen can do.
translation.zh: 你可以玩耍、跑步 做正常青少年做的所有事

translation.en: "You're doing something that positively impacts the rest of your life.
translation.zh: 你现在做的是 会对下半生有积极影响的事

translation.en: "Keep the faith.
"Kindest, Don.
"P.S.
"If God brings you to it, he will bring you through it."
translation.zh: 如果上帝有意让你遭此难 他会保佑你平安度过”

translation.en: It's not long before you go home. This is your first step in that direction.
translation.zh: 不久你就可以回家了 这是你回家的第一步

translation.en: My first step is wanting to vomit.
Yeah, nausea will get you every time.
translation.zh: 对 每次做治疗你都会恶心

translation.en: Your equilibrium has changed.
translation.zh: 你的平衡能力已经改变了

translation.en: You've grown used to being in a horizontal position.
translation.zh: 你习惯了保持水平姿势

translation.en: I'd like my tools back.
Hi, I'm Christy, your long-lost pen pal.
translation.zh: 你好 我是克丽丝蒂 你久未联系的笔友

translation.en: Or Hopalong Cassidy, as my friends say.
translation.zh: 也可以叫我霍帕朗卡西迪 我朋友就这么叫我

translation.en: Hi.
I'm Don.
-How are you? -Could be worse.
How's that?
Okay, you got me. It can't get much worse.
translation.zh: 好吧 听你这么说 不可能更糟了

translation.en: The endless reruns of The Brady Bunch at 3:00 a.m.
translation.zh: 凌晨3点反复看《脱线家族》

translation.en: Yeah, well,
I wish my only problem was getting hit in the face with a football like Marcia.
translation.zh: 我希望我唯一的问题是 像马西亚一样被橄榄球砸到脸

translation.en: I'd take a broken nose to dance normal.
translation.zh: 我会带着砸破的鼻子 正常地去跳舞

translation.en: You'll dance.
Only the truest friends show up when you have to move.
translation.zh: 搬家时出现的朋友才是真朋友

translation.en: Trust me, this is a vacation.
translation.zh: 相信我 这次就像度假

translation.en: -Vacation? -Yes, from my children.
Well, thank you.
Remember when Don's parents gave us this painting?
translation.zh: 还记得唐的父母 什么时候给我这幅画吗？

translation.en: Yes, I remember.
I remember you tried to pawn it off on me and then Susan and...
translation.zh: 我记得你还想卖给我 然后苏珊和

That's not true!
-That is true. -And never told Don.
Is all this stuff going to fit in the new house?
translation.zh: 这些东西都能放进新家吗？

translation.en: I think so. This place just isn't gonna work for Don.
translation.zh: 应该能 这里就是不适合唐

translation.en: You know, with all the stairs and him being in a wheelchair.
translation.zh: 这里到处是楼梯 而他要坐轮椅

translation.en: Plus, the new home is closer to the church.
translation.zh: 另外 新家离教堂近些

translation.en: That will be nice.
Just came by to check on you. See how you were doing.
translation.zh: 我就是过来看看你 看你怎么样了

translation.en: You're looking good.
I hear you're gonna be going home before long.
translation.zh: 我听说不久你就可以出院回家了

translation.en: Anything I can do for you before I go?
translation.zh: 我走前有什么能为你做的吗？

translation.en: That's a very fine offer.
I wish I had a magazine to read.
You do? Really?
I think so.
I haven't read one in a while.
Well, all right. Give me just a minute.
Jay B. Perkins, a retired minister, was a powerful father figure to me.
translation.zh: 杰伊B珀金斯 一位退休牧师 他对我来说就像父亲

translation.en: And I was grateful for his service to my church while I was incapacitated.
translation.zh: 我受伤期间 他在教堂里顶替我 我很感激

translation.en: This ought to do you.
There you go.
-Thank you much. I'll... -That'll keep you busy.
translation.zh: -多谢 我 -这下你有得忙了

translation.en: -I'll read them a bit later. -Yeah.
Anything else I can do?
No, that's... That's all I need. Thank you.
translation.zh: 不用有杂志就行 谢谢

translation.en: When you open the door and let somebody do something nice for you,
translation.zh: 你看 打开门 让人进来为你做点好事

translation.en: turns out not to be so hard after all.
You were right, Jay B.
I thought that
relieving people of the responsibility of having to care for me
was the right thing to do.
It wasn't.
They would heal me if they could,
translation.zh: 如果可以 他们一定会治好我

translation.en: and since they can't do that, they were caring for me
translation.zh: 因为没办法治 他们就关心我

translation.en: in the only way that they can.
I have denied them
the blessing of caring.
You've loved me enough to tell me the truth.
translation.zh: 你对我说真话 足见你爱我

translation.en: I won't forget it.
And I never have.
After 34 surgeries
translation.zh: 经历了34次手术后 第105天

translation.en: and nearly four months in the hospital,
Dr. Greider said I could go home.
translation.zh: 格雷德医生说我可以回家了

translation.en: Bye, thank you.
Dr. Greider.
Hold up a second.
Tell me something.
Just how bad was I when they brought me in the night of the accident?
translation.zh: 出事那晚 他们送我来医院时 我伤得有多严重？

translation.en: I've seen worse,
but they didn't live.
Thank you, sir.
He would become a friend of mine from that day forward.
translation.zh: 从那天起 他会成为我的朋友

translation.en: -Bye, Christy. -Bye.
I want you to call me when you get out of here.
translation.zh: 你出院后给我打电话哦

translation.en: Will do.
Hi, Daddy!
Hey, Dad!
How do you like the new house?
What do you think?
Welcome home, Daddy, welcome home.
translation.zh: 欢迎回家 爸爸 欢迎回家

translation.en: I think I'm home.
There's the kitchen.
Did you put milk in it? I'm just gonna do this.
translation.zh: 你倒牛奶了吗？我来倒吧

translation.en: I know.
Is it good?
Smells good in there.
translation.zh: 我在里面都闻到香味了

translation.en: Why don't you... We're gonna play a game. Okay, you ready?
translation.zh: 我们玩个游戏好吗？ 好 准备好了吗？

translation.en: Eva organized something called the Don Patrol.
translation.zh: 伊娃组织了“唐的巡逻队”

translation.en: A group of church members and friends who took care of me
translation.zh: 让一些教会成员和朋友 帮忙照顾我

translation.en: so that she could teach and we could keep our insurance.
translation.zh: 这样她就可以回学校上课 维持我们的保险有效

translation.en: The Don Patrol would arrive around 9:00 while I was still sleeping.
translation.zh: “唐的巡逻队”早上9点到 我还在睡梦中

translation.en: Good morning.
I might awake to see one of the Susans knitting on the couch at the end of my bed.
translation.zh: 我醒来可能看到其中一个苏珊 在我床边的沙发上织毛衣

translation.en: Or someone would be there with a toothbrush so I could brush my teeth.
translation.zh: 或者谁拿着牙刷 等着我醒来刷牙

translation.en: Looking good.
Often times holding a glass of juice before I was done doing that.
translation.zh: 很多时候 我还没刷完牙 就有人给我备好了果汁

translation.en: Maybe even offering an electric shaver.
translation.zh: 有时候还给我电动剃须刀

translation.en: All right, I've never actually used one of these before.
translation.zh: 好啊 我之前从来没用过

translation.en: It's pretty simple.
You know what, it doesn't actually work.
translation.zh: 你知道吗 这不管用

translation.en: And a big lunch.
Turkey sandwich, oatmeal cookie, pickles.
translation.zh: 火鸡肉三明治、燕麦饼干、泡菜

translation.en: You can't pass up baby pickles.
translation.zh: 泡菜很嫩 你得尝尝

translation.en: -I'll take the apple. -Okay.
Another friend might be reading the newspaper,
translation.zh: 另一个朋友可能在那看报纸

translation.en: ready to entertain me.
Yeah, whatever you need. I'll even sing for you if you want.
translation.zh: 好 随便你想做什么 我甚至可以给你唱歌

translation.en: Some guests would even make themselves quite comfortable.
translation.zh: 有些客人还把自己 弄得蛮舒服的

translation.en: Hey, Butterfly.
Come here.
Butterfly, no!
Hey!
Hi, honey.
Everything okay?
-You sure? -Yeah.
It smells like pee in here.
I know. It was the dog.
translation.zh: 我知道 是小狗尿的

translation.en: It's okay if you can't make it to the bathroom.
translation.zh: 如果你尿裤子了 那也没事

translation.en: It was the dog.
Butterfly?
Hey, Dad.
Come on.
You can do it.
I did it.
I did it.
I walked! I walked.
Oh, Lord, I walked.
translation.zh: 噢 上帝啊 我能走了

translation.en: What's going on? What's happening?
-Ma'am. -Where's Don?
-Ma'am. -Where's my husband?
Ma'am. I'd like for you to consider this as a private matter.
translation.zh: 女士 我希望你当这次是私事

translation.en: -Private? -Private.
-This is my house. -Hey.
I've seen it all.
Bet you haven't seen this yet.
What's going on?
I got my fixator stuck to the toilet seat.
translation.zh: 我把固定器卡在马桶座上了

translation.en: Happy birthday.
This is a perfect day.
God has given me children so much better than I deserve.
translation.zh: 上帝给了我如此完美的孩子 我配不上他们

translation.en: How can I ever thank you for all they mean to me?
translation.zh: 我要如何感谢你 把他们带到我身边？

translation.en: You being alive is the gift.
translation.zh: 你活着就是给我们的礼物

translation.en: Dad, will you dance with me?
translation.zh: 爸爸 你跟我跳舞好吗？

translation.en: Sweetie, I'd like to, but...
translation.zh: 宝贝 我想 但是

translation.en: Please, Dad.
-I don't think I can. -Please?
I need you to help me up here.
David!
What are you doing here?
I'm in town for a discipleship weekend.
translation.zh: 我来镇上参加教友周末活动

translation.en: It's the excuse I use to come into the house and spend time with you.
translation.zh: 我正好有借口来家里陪陪你

translation.en: Thank you for your friendship,
and your relentless commitment to prayer.
translation.zh: 也谢谢你不断为我祈祷

translation.en: Of course, Don. How you feeling now?
translation.zh: 应该的 唐 你感觉怎么样？

translation.en: In pain.
But I'm always in pain.
That's not the worst part of it for me right now.
translation.zh: 现在对我来说疼不算最糟糕的

translation.en: There are things I can't physically do anymore.
translation.zh: 有些事我这样的身体 是再也做不了了

translation.en: I'm not sure that God wants me to continue at South Park.
translation.zh: 我想上帝不会想 让我继续到南方公园去了

translation.en: I feel loved and needed there,
translation.zh: 在那里我感觉到被爱、被需要

translation.en: but I'm not sure it's where I should be.
translation.zh: 但我不确定我该去那里

translation.en: What did you learn from your accident and your recovery experience?
translation.zh: 你从这次事故和恢复经历中 学习到了什么？

translation.en: Letting other people inside.
Allowing others to help me.
But in the midst of all the suffering and despondency,
David,
I've learned that heaven is real.
translation.zh: 我了解到天堂真实存在

translation.en: What do you mean by that?
I died that day.
The next moment, I stood in heaven.
translation.zh: 接下来那一刻 我站在天堂中

translation.en: Why haven't you mentioned this before?
translation.zh: 之前怎么没听你提起这事？

translation.en: I have two very good reasons for that.
Number one, I go around talking about having been to heaven,
translation.zh: 第一 如果我到处讲自己去过天堂

translation.en: people will think I'm nuts.
Why would you think that?
-You just told me. -Number two...
-I don't think you're nuts. -Number two.
I don't want to go over that experience again.
translation.zh: 我不想再回想起那种经历

translation.en: It's too personal, too special.
It's my sacred secret.
Is it possible that God took you to heaven,
translation.zh: 有没有可能是上帝带你去的天堂

translation.en: brought you back,
so that you could share your experience with others?
translation.zh: 这样你可以跟他人分享这次经历？

translation.en: Don't you realize what a powerful encouragement you could be?
translation.zh: 你没意识到自己 可以成为多么强大的鼓励吗？

translation.en: I want you to make a covenant with me.
-What kind of a covenant? -It's simple.
Find someone you trust.
Share a little bit about your story, just to gauge their response.
translation.zh: 稍微分享一下你的故事 看看他们怎么回答

translation.en: If they think you're crazy or you hallucinated,
translation.zh: 如果他们认为你疯了 或者产生了幻觉

translation.en: I promise... I promise, you never have to talk about it again.
translation.zh: 我保证 你就再也不用说起此事

translation.en: But if they rejoice with you and urge you to tell them more,
translation.zh: 如果他们为此开心 让你一定多讲一些

translation.en: I want you to take it as a sign.
A sign that God wants you to talk about those 90 minutes you spent in heaven.
translation.zh: 分享你在天堂的90分钟 是上帝的旨意

translation.en: I think I can do that much.
When?
Soon.
I promise.
Very soon, right?
All right, very soon.
-Hi, honey. -Hi, darling.
translation.zh: -嗨 亲爱的 -嗨 亲爱的

translation.en: Hey, David. Glad you could make it.
translation.zh: 嘿 大卫 很高兴你能来

translation.en: Soon as in now.
-Honey? -Yes.
Darling, I want to tell you something.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我想跟你说个事

translation.en: What's that?
Remember the day I left for the convention?
translation.zh: 还记得我去参加会议那天吗？

translation.en: Well, that morning just plays over and over in my head.
translation.zh: 那天早上反复出现在我脑海里

translation.en: And you said, "IOU."
Yes. And I do.
Well, in fact, I think I owe you.
translation.zh: 事实上 是我欠你的

translation.en: Don't I know it. I've been waiting a long time for that.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我一直等着呢

translation.en: I owe you an explanation.
Darling, would you sit down for a second?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你坐一会儿好吗？

translation.en: Please.
You know, I died in that accident.
translation.zh: 你知道 我在那天的车祸中死过

translation.en: When I woke up,
I was in heaven.
You went to heaven?
Yes.
Tell me more.
When I died,
I didn't flow through a long dark tunnel.
translation.zh: 我没有穿过一条又长又黑的隧道

translation.en: I had no sense of fading away or coming back.
translation.zh: 我没有逝去或复生的感觉

translation.en: I heard no voices calling to me or anything like that.
translation.zh: 也没听到呼唤我的声音之类的

translation.en: Simultaneous with my last recollection of seeing the bridge,
translation.zh: 我最后的回忆是看到那座桥

translation.en: the rain,
a light enveloped me
with a brilliance beyond earthly comprehension or description.
translation.zh: 那种光辉超出了世俗的理解 无法用言语形容

translation.en: In my next moment of awareness, I was standing in heaven.
translation.zh: 下一刻 我就意识到自己到了天堂

translation.en: It was perfect.
And I knew right then I would have no need sand never would again.
translation.zh: 我立刻就知道自己已无欲无求

translation.en: I didn't even think of Earth or of those left behind.
translation.zh: 我甚至没想起人世 或我身后的人们

translation.en: Though I did not see Jesus face-to-face,
translation.zh: 虽然我没有亲眼见到耶稣

translation.en: I did sense his presence at every turn.
translation.zh: 但处处都能感觉到他的存在

translation.en: And I did see people I had known.
translation.zh: 我见到了我曾经认识的人

translation.en: As they surged towards me,
translation.zh: 他们成群结队朝我走来

translation.en: I knew instantly that all of them had died during my lifetime.
translation.zh: 我立刻意识到 他们在我有生之年就已逝去

translation.en: Their presence seemed absolutely natural.
translation.zh: 他们的出现似乎那么自然而然

translation.en: It was as if God had removed anything negative or worrisome
translation.zh: 上帝好像拂去了我意识中

translation.en: from my consciousness,
translation.zh: 任何负面或烦恼的事情

translation.en: and I could only rejoice at being together with these wonderful people.
translation.zh: 跟那些那么棒的人在一起 我心中只有欢喜

translation.en: Donnie, I'm so excited you're here to join us.
translation.zh: 唐尼 我好高兴你加入我们

translation.en: I saw Papa.
You know, my grandfather that everyone called Joe.
translation.zh: 就是人人都喊他“乔”的爷爷

translation.en: I heard his voice and felt his embrace.
translation.zh: 我听到了他的声音 感觉到了他的拥抱

translation.en: I'd been with him when he'd suffered a heart attack at home
translation.zh: 他在家中心脏病犯后 我一直陪着他

translation.en: and had ridden with him in the ambulance.
I'd been standing just outside the emergency room at the hospital
when the doctor walked out and faced me.
translation.zh: 我就站在医院急诊室外

translation.en: The doctor shook his head and said softly, "We did everything we could."
translation.zh: 医生摇摇头 轻声说 “我们已经尽力了”

translation.en: As I walked among them, I became aware of the wide variety of ages.
translation.zh: 我走在他们中间 我开始意识到大家年龄各不相同

translation.en: Old and young and every age in between.
translation.zh: 年老的、年轻的 还有各种年龄的

translation.en: Many of them hadn't known each other on Earth,
translation.zh: 很多人在人世时相互并不认识

translation.en: but each had influenced my life in some way.
translation.zh: 但每个人都在某种程度上 影响了我的人生

translation.en: Even though they hadn't met on Earth,
translation.zh: 虽然他们在人世时并不认识

translation.en: they seemed to know each other now.
translation.zh: 现在他们好像都认识了

translation.en: One person in the greeting committee was Mike Wood, my childhood friend.
translation.zh: 问候委员会中有个人是 迈克伍德 我童年时的伙伴

translation.en: He was a popular kid and became a hero to me
translation.zh: 他是个受欢迎的孩子 是我心中的英雄

translation.en: because he lived the Christian lifestyle and often talked about it.
translation.zh: 因为他过着基督徒的生活方式 还经常谈论

translation.en: After high school, Mike received a full scholarship to Louisiana State University.
translation.zh: 高中毕业后 迈克收到 路易斯安纳州立大学的全额奖学金

translation.en: When he was 19, Mike was killed in a car wreck.
translation.zh: 那年迈克19岁 他死于车祸

translation.en: When I attended his funeral, I wondered if I would ever stop crying.
translation.zh: 去参加他的葬礼时 我没有停止过哭泣

translation.en: I couldn't understand why God had taken such a dedicated disciple.
translation.zh: 我想不通上帝为什么 带走这么虔诚的信徒

translation.en: Through the years since then,
I had never been able to forget that pain and sense of loss.
translation.zh: 我还是忘不了失去他的 那种痛苦和感觉

translation.en: Then I saw Barry Wilson, who had been a classmate in high school,
translation.zh: 然后我见到了巴里威尔森 他是我高中时的同学

translation.en: but later drowned in a lake.
translation.zh: 但后来在湖中溺水而亡

translation.en: Barry's smile radiated a happiness I didn't know was possible.
translation.zh: 巴里的笑容中透露着 我不曾知道的幸福

translation.en: And I saw my great-grandmother, Hattie Mann.
translation.zh: 我还见到了我曾祖母海蒂梅恩

translation.en: As a child, I knew her only after she had developed osteoporosis.
translation.zh: 我小时候 她得骨质疏松症后 我才认识她

translation.en: Her head and her shoulders were always bent forward,
translation.zh: 她的头和肩膀总是往前倾

translation.en: giving her a sort of humped appearance.
But the beautiful thing is she didn't carry these burdens in heaven.
translation.zh: 但美妙的是 在天堂中 她没有了这些负担

translation.en: Heaven was many things,
but without a doubt it was the greatest family reunion of all.
translation.zh: 但毫无疑问 那是最棒的家庭团聚

translation.en: A holy awe came over me as I stepped forward.
translation.zh: 踏入那里 我满怀着神圣的敬畏

translation.en: I had no idea what lay ahead,
but I sensed that with each step I took, it would grow more wondrous.
translation.zh: 但我感觉到每走一步 都会有更多奇妙景象

translation.en: And I heard the music.
I can only describe it as a holy swoosh of wings,
translation.zh: 我只能把它描述为 哗哗作响的扇翅膀声

translation.en: but I'd have to magnify that thousands of times
to explain the effect of the sound in heaven.
translation.zh: 才能描述天堂中那种声音

translation.en: It was the most beautiful and pleasant sound I'd ever heard.
translation.zh: 那是我听过的最美妙 最愉悦的声音

translation.en: I saw a bright iridescence.
translation.zh: 我看到了一道明亮的彩虹

translation.en: I peered through the gate yearning to see what lay beyond.
translation.zh: 我偷偷看向那道门 想看看远处有什么

translation.en: It wasn't an anxious yearning,
but a peaceful openness to experience all of the grace and joy of heaven.
translation.zh: 而是平静地准备经历 天堂中的一切从容和快乐

translation.en: At that very moment, I was about to realize the yearning of every human heart.
translation.zh: 那一切 我就要意识到 每个人心中的渴望

translation.en: I was in heaven, ready to go through the pearlescent gates.
translation.zh: 我在天堂中 准备穿过 一道道光芒四射的门

translation.en: Then, just as suddenly as I'd arrived at the gates of heaven,
translation.zh: 就在我到达天堂门口时

translation.en: I left there.
I spent a lot of time in the hospital trying to make sense of all of this.
translation.zh: 我在医院里想了很久 试图想清楚这一切的意义

translation.en: I was paralyzed by the notion of not wanting to return.
translation.zh: 我被不想复生的念想麻痹了

translation.en: I mean, why come back to this much pain?
translation.zh: 我想为何要回来承受这么多痛苦？

translation.en: I think now I know.
I do, too.
I believe it's time for me to go back to church.
translation.zh: 我想我是时候回教堂了

translation.en: I believe that, too.
Have you told anyone else about this?
translation.zh: 你跟别人说起过这件事吗？

translation.en: Yes.
David.
Are you hurt that I didn't tell you first?
translation.zh: 没有第一个告诉你 你难过吗？

translation.en: No.
I feel elated to know.
translation.zh: 现在知道了 我很高兴

translation.en: Because it enables me to understand the man to whom I'm married.
translation.zh: 因为这让我了解了 我嫁的这个男人

translation.en: Eva.
Yes.
Eva,
no one should have to do the things that you had to do for me.
translation.zh: 你没有义务为我付出这么多

translation.en: But you did them,
faithfully, compassionately and without hesitation.
translation.zh: 你对我不离不弃 满怀同情 毫不迟疑

translation.en: You come closest
to really knowing how painful this journey has been for me.
translation.zh: 这个过程中我有多痛苦

translation.en: Each day,
you endured it with me.
Eva,
you are my gift from God.
translation.zh: 你是上帝赐予我的礼物

translation.en: I was so enthusiastic about finally returning to South Park.
translation.zh: 终于可以回南方公园了 我满怀激情

translation.en: I hadn't been out of bed for more than an hour at a time,
translation.zh: 我好久没有下床超过一小时了

translation.en: and, well, I overestimated my endurance and suddenly felt incredibly fatigued.
translation.zh: 我高估了自己的承受力 突然间就累坏了

translation.en: Yet, the overwhelming response from the congregation gave me
a new burst of strength,
and I knew right then that their praise was for God's work and my healing.
translation.zh: 我随即意识到他们的赞美 是为了上帝的工作和我的康复

translation.en: It's only taken me
five months
to get from the conference at Trinity Pines back to church.
translation.zh: 就从三一松会议回到了教堂

translation.en: I may be slow, but I'm faithful.
translation.zh: 我可能有点慢 但我很虔诚

translation.en: They would like for you to say something to the congregation.
translation.zh: 他们希望你跟会众说说话

translation.en: Eva, I think I made a mistake. I don't think I can do this.
translation.zh: 伊娃 我犯了个错误 我觉得我不能这样做

translation.en: -You can. -I'm not sure if I'm ready.
translation.zh: -你可以的 -我不知道是否准备好了

translation.en: You are.
Let's hear it, Don.
translation.zh: 说给我们听听吧 唐

translation.en: Say something, Don, please.
translation.zh: 说说吧 唐 拜托

translation.en: You prayed.
I'm here.
Here he is.
Hey, Don! Don!
Hey!
-You made it. -Yeah.
It's so good to see you.
I believe that I'm alive today because you prayed me back to Earth.
translation.zh: 我相信今天我还活着 是因为你祈祷让我重回人世

translation.en: Tell you what, you buy me lunch, we'll call it even.
translation.zh: 那这样好了 你请我吃午餐 我们就两不相欠了

translation.en: -All right, it's a deal. -That's right.
I couldn't figure out how to get inside, so I just pried open the trunk,
translation.zh: 当时我不知道该怎么进去 就撬开了后备箱

translation.en: knocked down the back seat and crawled in that way.
translation.zh: 把后座推倒 然后爬进去

translation.en: But even when I was praying with you, I didn't know it was you.
translation.zh: 但我为你祈祷时 并不知道是你

translation.en: Besides, no one lives through that.
translation.zh: 另外 那种情况没人能活下来

translation.en: Well, in my first moments of consciousness,
two things stand out.
First,
I was singing.
-I don't sing. -No.
What a Friend We Have in Jesus.
And the second was that Dick had climbed into the car with me
translation.zh: 第二件事是迪克 爬进车里来陪我

translation.en: and his hand had gripped mine and held it tight.
translation.zh: 他握着我的手 紧紧地

translation.en: But the one thing that is absolutely clear
was Dick being in the car and praying with me.
That's true. He did get in the car and prayed with you.
translation.zh: 没错 他的确到车里为你祈祷了

translation.en: But, Don, he never held your hand.
translation.zh: 可是 唐 他从来没有握你的手

translation.en: Nope.
I remember it so clearly, though. It was one of the most vivid details.
translation.zh: 可是我记得很清楚 那是最清楚的细节之一了

translation.en: It didn't happen. It was physically impossible.
translation.zh: 并没有 那是不可能的

translation.en: There's just no physical way possible I could have reached your right hand.
translation.zh: 但是我不可能够到你的右手

translation.en: But...
But I swear, I...
Someone was holding your hand,
but it wasn't Dick.
Dick Onerecker was a real prayer warrior before and after the accident.
translation.zh: 那次事故之前和之后 迪克奥内莱克都是在真正的祷告勇士

translation.en: He would pass away only a few years after praying for me on that bridge.
translation.zh: 在那座桥上为我祈祷后 没几年他就去世了

translation.en: Okay, you guys, right in here.
-Hey, darling. Darling. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -嘿 亲爱的、亲爱的 -怎么了？

translation.en: -I'll be right back. -Okay.
Boy, that really hurts, doesn't it?
translation.zh: 孩子 真的很疼 是吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it hurts very much.
Yeah, I know.
Believe me, I know.
You do?
Yeah. I had one, too.
It's horrible.
It's just horrible.
It's awful, I know that.
I wore one on my left leg for 11 months.
-Nobody ever understands. -Well, they can't.
translation.zh: -没人能理解我 -他们没法理解

translation.en: It's not something you can talk about and have anyone understand your pain.
translation.zh: 这不是说出来 别人就能理解的事

translation.en: -I'm Don. -I'm Mark.
Well, Mark,
you just met someone who does understand the pain
translation.zh: 你刚刚认识了能理解你痛苦的人

translation.en: and the discouragement you're going through.
I don't know if I'm gonna make it.
translation.zh: 我不知道自己是否能挺过去

translation.en: You'll make it.
You're gonna make it. Hey.
Hey, trust me. You'll make it.
translation.zh: 嘿 相信我 你能挺过去

translation.en: -What happened? -I had a skiing accident.
translation.zh: -出什么事了？ -我滑雪时出的事故

translation.en: You're a football player?
Yes, sir.
I'm gonna tell you something.
One day, you will walk again.
translation.zh: 有一天 你能重新站起来走路

translation.en: You might not be playing football, but you'll walk.
translation.zh: 你可能玩不了橄榄球了 但你能走路

translation.en: Here's my card. Number's right there.
translation.zh: 这是我的名片 上面有我的电话

translation.en: You can call me anytime day or night, 24 hours a day. All right?
translation.zh: 你随时可以给我打电话 24小时都行 好吗？

translation.en: Now, I'm gonna walk back over there to my family.
translation.zh: 现在我要回去找我的家人了

translation.en: I want you to watch me,
and as you watch, I want you to know that one day you will walk, too.
translation.zh: 看看我 我想让你知道 有一天你也能走路

translation.en: You'll probably do it better than I do.
You met someone who understands. Give me a call, all right?
translation.zh: 你遇到了理解你的人 给我打电话 好吗？

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you. Thank you so much.
Hey, it's not about me.
translation.zh: 嘿 这不是我的意思

translation.en: Before I died on that bridge, I was unsure of what my purpose was.
translation.zh: 我在桥上死去之前 我不确定自己活着的目的

translation.en: Now I see it more clearly.
Ministering and sharing the hope I found.
translation.zh: 做一名牧师 分享我发现的希望

translation.en: Over 25 years ago,
that big truck took my life on that old bridge.
translation.zh: 那辆大卡车在那座古老的桥上 夺去了我的生命

translation.en: I am not the man I used to be.
translation.zh: 唐尼派珀牧师 乔治亚州亚特兰大-2015年3月5日 我已不是曾经的我

translation.en: I have been beaten up,
but I'm not beaten.
translation.zh: 但现在的我不会被打败

translation.en: I have chosen to be not bitter,
but better.
And it is a choice.
Every day of my life, I still ask the same question
translation.zh: 我生命中的每一天 我都问自己相同的问题

translation.en: that I asked in that bed, that hospital bed, every day.
translation.zh: 我在医院的床上也每天都问自己

translation.en: "Oh, Lord, why?
"Why did you let me see heaven and take it away from me?"
translation.zh: 为什么让我看到天堂 又让我重回人间？”

translation.en: I believe it is so that I could be here with you today
translation.zh: 我相信只有这样 今天我才能与你们在一起

translation.en: and tell you to your face,
God still answers prayer.
translation.zh: 上帝会回应我们的祷告

translation.en: God is still in the miracle business today.
God is able to help us find a new normal,
translation.zh: 上帝能帮我们找到新生活

translation.en: and overcome tragedy and loss, pain and suffering.
translation.zh: 克服悲剧、失败、痛苦和苦难

translation.en: And God is building us a better place.
translation.zh: 上帝在为我们创造一个更美好的地方

translation.en: Heaven is real.
I may not meet you here,
this side of heaven.
So my prayer for you today is, if I don't meet you here,
translation.zh: 所以我今天要祈祷 如果没有在这里遇到你们

translation.en: one day I want to see you there
translation.zh: 希望有一天到那里相遇

translation.en: at the gates.
And may God help us to be found faithful until that day.
translation.zh: 愿上帝保佑我们虔诚如斯 直到那一天
